name: FeedItem
description: Represents a single feed item in a Chatter feed.
summary:
The `FeedItem` object in Salesforce is used to represent posts and activities within the Chatter feed. It includes various attributes that capture details about the post, such as its creation, content, and engagement metrics. Here is a summary of the key attributes:

- **Id (id)**: Unique identifier for the feed item.
- **ParentId (reference)**: Reference to the parent record (e.g., user, record) of the feed item.
- **Type (picklist)**: Specifies the type of feed item, such as text, link, or content.
- **CreatedById (reference)**: Reference to the user who created the feed item.
- **CreatedDate (datetime)**: Timestamp when the feed item was created.
- **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item has been deleted.
- **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: Timestamp of the last modification to the feed item.
- **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: System-generated timestamp for the last update.
- **Revision (int)**: Revision number of the feed item.
- **LastEditById (reference)**: Reference to the user who last edited the feed item.
- **LastEditDate (datetime)**: Timestamp of the last edit.
- **CommentCount (int)**: Number of comments on the feed item.
- **LikeCount (int)**: Number of likes the feed item has received.
- **Title (string)**: Title of the feed item.
- **Body (textarea)**: Content or message of the feed item.
- **LinkUrl (url)**: URL link included in the feed item.
- **IsRichText (boolean)**: Indicates whether the body content is rich text.
- **RelatedRecordId (reference)**: Reference to a related record, if any.
- **InsertedById (reference)**: Reference to the user who inserted the feed item.
- **BestCommentId (reference)**: Reference to the best comment on the feed item.
- **HasContent (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item contains content.
- **HasLink (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item contains a link.
- **HasFeedEntity (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item is associated with a feed entity.
- **HasVerifiedComment (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item has a verified comment.
- **IsClosed (boolean)**: Indicates whether the feed item is closed.
- **Status (picklist)**: Status of the feed item, such as open, closed, etc.

These attributes collectively provide a comprehensive view of the feed item's metadata, content, and user interactions within the Salesforce Chatter environment.
label: Feed Item
